reviews.title: Don\'t spend money!!
reviews.comment: Love Com2us games but the hub does not work. Talked to customer service from com2us about the fact that I\'ve spent money on more than one of the games and when I got my new phone, re-installed the game,  and tried to continue with my hub data it wasn\'t there (they would not talk to me only email) one email asked if I saved my data and when I Told wen yes they said \"it\'s not comparable with all devices\" and even though I have receipts through email they will not refund me for what I lost

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
